ðŸ“– Summary: The `his` utility enhances command-line productivity by providing a visually rich and easily searchable command history. It uses icons and colors to categorize commands and offers fuzzy search for quick retrieval. `his` is designed to work seamlessly on both Windows and GNU/Linux operating systems.
